name: Cooper-Standard Holdings Inc.
description: Cooper-Standard Holdings Inc. is a leading global supplier of systems and components for the automotive industry, specializing in sealing, fuel and brake delivery, and fluid transfer systems. Founded in 1960 and headquartered in Novi, Michigan, Cooper-Standard operates in over 20 countries and serves a diverse clientele that includes major automotive manufacturers worldwide. The company focuses on innovation and sustainability, delivering high-quality products designed to enhance performance, safety, and environmental sustainability. With a commitment to advancing automotive technology, Cooper-Standard has invested in research and development to create products that meet the evolving needs of the automotive market, such as lightweight materials and advanced sealing solutions. The company prides itself on its operational excellence, leveraging lean manufacturing principles and a strong supply chain to deliver value to both customers and shareholders. Cooper-Standard's mission is to provide innovative solutions that drive the future of mobility, ensuring reliability and efficiency in every product they deliver.
